dialogue: It's Erica.
Never mind, it's open.
It's me.
Hi.
Oh, Drake, isn't it amazing?
Well, here we sit, devil may care, just a little while ago you were reattaching someone's spinal cord.
Who's they?
Oh Drake, you are so talented, let me see those hands. Oh these hands, these beautiful hands, oh I could just eat them. . . but I won't.
No, seriously. These hands. These miracle, magical, life-giving hands. Oh, just to be near them, touch them, maybe even lick one?
Well, yes, yes, the best doctor in all of Salem, Dr. Drake Remore.
I don't understand, why didn't you help that man?
No, no no no, you don't have to tell me anything. You don't have to explain yourself to me. Ooh, who am I to question the great Dr. Drake Remore?
I should just be happy to be near you.
Hey what?
It's Erica.
How did you get here so fast, I just saw you in Salem?
Ohh, and I see you're having a little party too. Is she here, huh, huh?
Sabrina. I know about you two. I saw you today kissing in the doctor's lounge.
Oh my God. Do the people at the hospital know about this?
How, how can you be here and there.
Drake, what're you getting at?
Is this true?
Is all this true?

dialogue: I don't think so. Although, they did mention something about two heartbeats. But I thought that was just mine and the baby's. They kept saying both heartbeats are really strong, and I thought well, that's good 'cause I'm having a baby.

filename: S10E17-S10E18 The Last One Part I  II.txt

dialogue: Okay.
I know.
No, I don't mind you touching my belly, but right now your hand is kind of blocking the part where the baby is gonna come out.
Hi.
That's because I'm pregnant!
Oh, ok. I'm just always afraid that people think I'm just fat with big breasts.
Hey, well, in a couple of weeks I won't be able to travel.
Plus hotels are fun! My room has this little fridge full of free snacks!
Hi!
Yeah, you know, maybe I ate too much. I keep getting these stomach aches. They come and go like every few minutes.
You can do this. Just breathe.
Hi.
So, it's Monica and Chandler. I only know you as file 0W33815-D.
Gosh, you know, you're just such an amazing couple. It's... kind of intimidating.
You're kidding me? I mean, it's enough that you are a doctor. But on top of it, you're married to a reverend?
Yeah, I read some great applications, but then I thought “who better then a minister to raise a child!”
Reverend, can I ask? Does the bible say anything about adoption?
Wow.
We’re great, I think I may have asked all my questions.
Actually, I don’t think we have to.
Hi!
What?
So who are you?
So you lied to me before?
I can't believe this.
Giving you my baby? You think I'd give you my child after this?
I don't want to look at your file! This is over.
Why don't you ask the reverend to pray on it?
Thank you. It's really nice to meet you guys, I can't believe I'm here!
I wanna see everything! Times Square, Coney Island, Rockefeller Center...
Oh yeah, let's do that!
Thanks so much for taking me to all those places. I had a great time.
Thanks so much for showing me around.
Well, there is a chance it's another guy. I mean, I have only ever been with two guys, but they sorta overlapped.
Well, it turns out that Erica didn't pay much attention in Sex Ed class, because the thing she did with that prison guy... it'd be pretty hard to make a baby that way.
